channel.title: Posts on courtnicles blog

item.title: first post
item.description:
I dabbled in HTML and CSS when I was a kid playing neopets.
I'm trying to relearn it.
And I guess build a positive digital footprint.
My inspiration was from a not-so-positive site though. The color scheme was a lot more pleasing than the default.
Would you be able to get what it is?
